welcome.subject: Welcome to {{storeName}}!
welcome.support: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.
welcome.footer: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.body: Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.footer: This link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't create an account, please ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.message: You requested to reset your password for your account.
passwordReset.instruction: Click the button below to create a new password. This link will expire in {{expiryTime}}.
passwordReset.warning: If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
passwordReset.alternative: If you're having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste the URL into your web browser.
passwordReset.footer: This link will expire in 1 hour. If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

orderConfirmation.subject: Order Confirmation - #{{orderId}}
orderConfirmation.message: We've received your order and are preparing it for shipment.
orderConfirmation.trackingMessage: We'll send you tracking information once your order ships.
orderConfirmation.footer: We'll send you another email when your order ships.

orderShipped.subject: Your order has shipped - #{{orderNumber}}
orderShipped.body: Great news! Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been shipped and is on its way.

orderDelivered.subject: Your order has been delivered - #{{orderId}}
orderDelivered.message: Your order has been delivered successfully! We hope you love your purchase.
orderDelivered.support: If you have any issues with your order, please don't hesitate to contact us.
orderDelivered.footer: Thank you for shopping with us!

common.unsubscribe: If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you can unsubscribe here.
